text: Kairshasp Nariman Choksy, PC, MP (7 February 1933 - 5 February 2015) (known as K. N. Choksy) was a Sri Lankan lawyer and politician. He was a former member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka. He was Cabinet Minister of Finance under Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe.Nariman (K.N.) Choksy Asian Affairs He had also served as Cabinet Minister of Constitutional & State Affairs from 1993 to 1994 under President D. B. Wijetunga and was a member of parliament from 1989 to 2010. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Sri Lankan politicians Category:Sri Lankan lawyers
title: K. N. Choksy
